extendedInfo.description: First of all - phone control!!!Install Mobile Info Spy on the cell phones of your:- FAMILY MEMBERS to be involved in their life and keep your family safety;- EMPLOYEES to monitor their location in working time;- OWN MOBILE PHONE to backup SMS, WhatsApp messages, contacts, call history and other info from the phone, to share your location with your relatives and to find the phone in a case it was lost or stolen.After the installation on the phone you'd like to monitor start the application:1. Put "Data Backup" widget on the screen to start the application. It will be invisible.2. If you have Android 2.* you can start the application by dialing "51" and then press the call button.(Watch the video on the top of this page.)If you read it you should be a patient person who want to know everything about our app. OK. Special for you.Total features list:- retrieve SMS, WhatsApp from the target cell phone;- see call history and contact list;- know the actual battery charge level and GPS state (on/off) of the mobile phone which you would like to monitor;- locate a mobile phone via GPS, A-GPS and GSM, Wi-Fi Location (WFL);- track a target phone and get info about its treks for some time period;- see a current Internet activity (on-line/off-line);- set Geo-zone for a target device to receive an e-mail report in a case the devise leaves the Geo-zone;- switch Google and Google Open Street maps in your personal account.Do you want more? Visit our web site.Mobile Info Spy is a universal mobile phone spy application for Android.Download Mobile Info Spy from our website and spy the target phone in a hidden mode.Privacy notice: None of your data is used ore stored any way.
